TopicTitle: Space Shuttle Pack for ksp 1.0.4 dev thread

Articles.Content:
Just go ahead, bring us things to test out. I already have a separate install of ksp just for testing CSS.![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

- - - Updated - - -

One suggestion, though: an alterbativ to that crew compartment or at least a higher up attach node for getting 2.5 m payloads to it without clipping.
Starting to feel pressure Mike? We have great expectations ;-)

> 
> Starting to feel pressure Mike? We have great expectations ;-)

I have been asked to help with iss, I may have a bit of work with Jozvin but dragon don't officially need my help with new shuttle.

I guess I can keep working on this old model if I have people who want me to.

argh I want to keep working on it anyway, even if only for me to use

> I guess I can keep working on this old model if I have people who want me to.

I like your work and appreciate it. Keep on going my man!

> 
> I have been asked to help with iss, I may have a bit of work with Jozvin but dragon don't officially need my help with new shuttle.
> I guess I can keep working on this old model if I have people who want me to.
> 
> argh I want to keep working on it anyway, even if only for me to use

Yeah you must continue. Doing great work. Lets get this beauty flying.
We want it!! Post your latest changes please

Okay guys, I tested the latest update for a while and Mike I found that you did not copy my SSME & OMS drag config. This results in too much drag for the Shuttle so it is not possible to glide in and maintain speed.

I have fixed these configs and it flies like a beauty. You are now gaining speed when you fly a 20 degree angle so it is possible to land around 110 m/s now if you like (thats the real life shuttle landing speed). 

You can download the update here:

[https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B-ALRjYUGKH7T3NsVUI3SlUyM2c/view?usp=sharing](https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B-ALRjYUGKH7T3NsVUI3SlUyM2c/view?usp=sharing)

Installation:

Delete your current ***GameData\CSS\Parts*** folder and unzip the file to ***GameData\CSS***

Hope you like it!

\* This update does not have Mike's tail flap included.

\*\* That sounds very wrong btw

Working on the HUD, now it looks more like the real HUD. And watch the speed on the left ;-)

![uc?export=download&id=0B-ALRjYUGKH7VzBWallaX0hJRnc](https://drive.google.com/uc?export=download&id=0B-ALRjYUGKH7VzBWallaX0hJRnc)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-06T21:07:28Z" title="06/06/2015 09:07  PM" data-short="9 yr">June 6, 2015</time> by Jeast**

aw awesome fix

also you don't like the tail flap idea?

Yeah I do. I meant talking about your tail flap. As a joke.

I did not yet download and test it thats why I have not yet included it.

oooh you mean that body flap. not the tail control surface...

yeah MY tail flap is not good on a space shuttle lol

- - - Updated - - -

yaaae this shuttle is awesome..... I want to actually use it. for fun. not testing.

Mike continue pls with this old model. 

As I said I will need your new textures ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) and maybe that new IVA cockpit too ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) But first we need to see how it will look like on this model. 

So pls keep up the good work. 

Have a nice day

landing gear working but need to put on better textures in some areas

Hmm OK wheel I will definetly use it. I created some basic one like that one on the left ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif) BUt created some other detials.

Did you get the solar panels fixed ?
Nope still shows the error but dont crash it
so what is not working on that at the moment? I honestly haven't even looked at it

Attach Nodes are all messed up and the S3/P3 Truss give an error in the debug.

[ERR 18:17:37.480] ConvexMesh::loadConvexHull: convex hull init failed!

[ERR 18:17:37.485] Ignore collision failed. Both colliders need to be activated when calling this IgnoreCollision
Let me have a go at it. so that's ISS\_truss\_s3\_p3?
yes thats the one. It has somthing to do with the solar panels. The error goes away if you retract them.

so they both extend? the solar panels?

only one is animated in blender

the game doesn't like the expanding collider. I will try remake the collision
